attributes.additional_details:
Mr Joyce epitomises all that is wrong with UK politics and his quote "You can't touch me, I'm an MP" exemplifies the the state of immunity that MPs appear to have.

We, the undersigned, request that Eric Joyce does the honourable thing and step down as MP.  Failing that, we request that he be made an example of and removed from office for violations of the House of Commons Rules of Conduct.
